Blog.post: Hey, check out some of the other people in team zyclon's blogs! urlLink Zyclon S
for some reason, inviting people to join my blog isn't working i have no idea why not, but it isn't please stand by for futher notices

Do you want to join the Zyclon team? Create a blog, think up a cool alias, and name ur blog "Zyclon *) * is the first letter of your alias! Once you've thought it all up, e-mail me, and tell me ur stuff.
He'd have to go into the closet to come out of it.
hey...wanted to say hello from denver...and checkin out the posts...i'll try to make it to lancouver 3...as long as bijan hasnt come out of the closet by then, peace
I now have a nexopia account (GodfatherD incase you care) check it out (Rate all my pics 10!) a link to this site is on there, so i may actually start gettin sum hits, lol
The date for lancouver 3 is official. straight from Tek's mouth..... computer: August 28th 2004 w00t~!!

Synarix here again..i decided 2 delete my blog 2day...there wasn't much point in me havin my own but i'll still post on Xaero's blog..haven't asked him yet since he's in kelowna :P but i dont think he'll mind... anyways my summer's been ok, not much happening...still waiting 2 go paintballin, still waitin 2 see when lancouv3r is n still waitin 2 see whether my rents r gonna bring us on a vacation.. well, thats all 4 now.. p.s. im gettin a new mp3 player...its a creative nomad MuVo TX ( in other words...SWEETNESS!!!!!! )
I'm goin 2 kelowna for the weekend. shud b nice. sum friends r gonna b ther so that'll b kool. peace

I got a old '95 laptop n just formatted it to have windows ME on it and its got wireless! its sweet, i go upstairs n can hook up the laptop to the 500 watt stereo system up ther n stream music from my desktop to it.

yay it worked! well this is gonna b interestin...i can post stuff on Xaeros blog mwahahahaha!!! this blog will never b the same :P... p.s. check out River Below by Billy Talent..its an awesome song.. Xaero Says: Welcome to my blog! Please, enjoy your stay

god's rain water flow through the same gutter that we, walk today, gotta stay brave brother, keep your lips stiff, keep your fist clenched, At times you gotta kick your way through this bitch Xaero Says: Cool! I can edit other people's posts! Nice lil poem there Anus

New User to this blog, Welcome ER, "autographing bitches' breasteses yo", SlimAnus, And Synarix!! Unfortunatly ER is in ontario on vacation n won't be postin much and a.b.b.y is a homosexual ape and doesn't want to post anything, so we may not here from them for a while.
Just like to let y'all know that user invitations are now up n workin, so if you wanna join my blog, let me know! i'll invite ya! the more the merrier!

Well u can cross off invitin me 2 the blog btw the banner dun't work make napalm... hmmm i can help u w/ that rid world of western doors. tried that, they put up quite a fight, what with those springs, u deck one, it'll swing back n forth n smack u in tha face. Supported In Part By Compu-G Enterprises

well...im gonna have some work to do when i get back...this blog is looking pretty bad...aside from the banner...if it's loading that is.......................................................anyhow..im coming back on august 5th...and this is what i have to do: 1. make napalm 2. fix blog 3. finish banner 4. Spice up blog 5. invite john to blog 6. invite bijan to blog 7. rid the world of those little western saloon doors you get in trendy clothes shops 8. if all goes well...make more napalm 9. live 10. die note: many things are unlisted, especially between 8 and 10

the title of this blog is dreams of A G.....and it was meant to house my dreams...but i think i'll put more..because its important my thoughts are here too....because after all, i am a "pensive" guy...hmm pensive vs. contemplative? pensive makes me sound like i have a ball point at one end of me... but anyway.. things are excellent...and im trying to spruce up this page...but im in denver right now, visiting my brother and family...im looking forward to being back...so i can get back to my stuff...but especially so i can see my baby
God's rain water flow through the same gutter that we, walk today, gotta stay brave brother, keep your lips stiff, keep your fist clenched.. At times you gotta kick your way through this bitch
